alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Crazy Mountains; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 24 at 3:06PM MDT until March 27 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 feet. Greatest accumulations will be found on north and northeast-facing slopes. * WHERE...In Montana, Absaroka/Beartooth Mountains, Crazy Mountains, and Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains. In Wyoming, Northeast Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...Until Noon MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Recreation in the high country will be impacted by heavy accumulating snow. Travel could be very difficult to impossible, including along Highway 14. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow will occur tonight through Saturday morning. Snow is expected to lighten Saturday night, then pick back up on Sunday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water on you in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Crazy Mountains; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains
